content: भृत्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भृ-क्यप् तक् च] To be nourished or maintained &c. --त्यः {@--1@} Any one requiring to be supported. {@--2@} A servant, dependant, slave. {@--3@} A king's servant, minister of state; <ls>H. 2. 142.</ls> {@--4@} A subject. --त्या {@--1@} Rearing, fostering, nourishing, taking care of; as in कुमारभृत्या <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--2@} Maintenance, support. {@--3@} A means of sustenance, food. {@--4@} Wages. {@--5@} Service.
